name: safer-dom
description: Most common DOM operations made safe by safer-function and safer-class.

scripts.build: npm run cjs && npm run rollup && npm run clean && npm test && npm run min && npm run size
scripts.clean: sed -i.bck -e 's/exports\..*//' index.js && sed -i.bck 's/return exports;/return index;/' index.js && rm index.js.bck
scripts.min: echo '/*! (c) Andrea Giammarchi - ISC */' > min.js && uglifyjs index.js -c -m >> min.js
scripts.size: cat index.js | wc -c;cat min.js | wc -c;gzip -c9 min.js | wc -c

author: Andrea Giammarchi
